Work Experience.text: Built and managed forecasting pipelines aligned with the full machine learning lifecycle, emphasizing reproducibility and documentation.

Developed scalable, housing-constrained cohort-component and logarithmic models to forecast Singapore’s resident and non-resident populations, using SingStat datasets and exogenous features forecasted with statsforecast to support long-term healthcare demand within NUHS cluster.

Managed and optimized a GAM-based bed occupancy forecasting pipeline, improving computational efficiency, forecast granularity, and internal documentation to support hospital resource planning, budgeting, and patient care decisions.

Developed and deployed a rule-based classification pipeline using tsfeatures to classify time series forecasts by materiality, volatility, and accuracy into intuitive labels, improving stakeholder interpretability.
Incorporated machine learning models using mlforecast, improving forecasting accuracy by ~70% for targeted time series previously forecasted with statistical and econometric models.

Designed and deployed a Dockerized Flask web application with Zoho REST APIs and SQLite backend, delivering a real-time KPI monitoring dashboard, reducing data-gathering for HR and management from one week to an hourly update.
Utilized Git for version control to ensure proper documentation and smoother handovers.

Education.title: Master of Science in Business Analytics
Education.text: Cumulative Average Point: 4.64 / 5.00. Participated in NUS-NCS Innovation Challenge (Champion Group), WorldQuant Alphathon 2023, Philip Nova Trading Challenge 2023, Hack & Roll 2024, Hack4Good 2024.

Education.title: Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) in Biomedical Engineering
Education.text: Cumulative Average Point: 4.39 / 5.00. Final Thesis: Developed a lightweight wheeled robot utilizing MediaPipe 3D pose estimation and polynomial fitting for gait analysis, improving prehabilitation efficiency and reducing reliance on specialized equipment and personnel.

Education.title: Undergraduate Research Opportunities Programme
Education.text: Developed a soft, tactile wearable gaming input device with capacitive sensors and low-latency response, enhancing immersive gaming experiences through improved tactile interaction.

Skills.text: Programming & Tools: Python, SQL, JavaScript, C, Git, Docker. Analytical & ML Tools: Tableau, pandas, NumPy, SQL, tsfeatures, scikit-learn, statsforecast, mlforecast, PyTorch Lightning. Web Technologies: Flask, Django, ReactJS, Node.js.

Soft Skills: Analytical thinking, problem-solving, time management, adaptability, project management, effective communication, teamwork. Certifications: AWS SageMaker Practical (Udemy), DeepLearning.AI Machine Learning in Production, IBM Data Science Professional Certificate.

Projects.text: Created educational materials for 65drones on phishing email detection using Word2Vec and spaCy embeddings, along with Isolation Forest and custom PyTorch Lightning autoencoders.
Implemented a CNN image segmentation model for multi-label movie genre classification, fine-tuned with a pre-trained ResNet18 feature extractor.
Implemented a DistilBERT-based newsgroup classifier with custom preprocessing and tokenization, fine-tuned frozen layers, and tracked training metrics using TensorBoard.
